actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Development and Applications.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Development and Applications

official_title: A bill to stimulate research and development aimed at the production of gasohol as an alternative energy source by establishing national demonstration facilities for the conversion of garbage and other solid wastes into fuels, to be constructed by the Secretary of Energy under the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1974.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to construct and operate national demonstration facilities for the conversion into fuels of garbage and other solid waste materials. Sets forth requirements for the siting and operating of such facilities, and specifies that one such facility shall be located in New Jersey. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to stimulate research and development aimed at the production of gasohol as an alternative energy source by establishing national demonstration facilities for the conversion of garbage and other solid wastes into fuels, to be constructed by the Secretary of Energy under the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1974.
